description: Numbers n such that 0 and 1 occur juxtaposed in the base 10 representation of n but not of n+1.
mathematica: Transpose[SequencePosition[Table[If[SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n],{0,1}]>0||SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n],{1,0}]>0,1,0],{n,2500}],{1,0}]][[1]] (* The program uses the SequencePosition and SequenceCount functions from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 10 2016 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
